content: लुल् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (लोलति, लुलित) {@--1@} To roll, roll about, move to and fro, toss about; लुलितदृष्टि मदादिव चस्खले <ls>Ki. 18. 6</ls>; <ls>Śi. 3. 72</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">10. 36.</ls> {@--2@} To shake, stir, agitate, make tremulous, disturb. {@--3@} To press down, crush; see लुलित below. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (लोलयति-ते) To shake, stir up; <ls>Śi. 9. 4.</ls>
